name: Li-Fi
description:
Transmit your light signal to receiver through maze-like rooms. Obstacles have 4 types that makes light behave differently. 

This game created in 48h Global GameJam 2018.

Credits:

Ataberk Palacıoğlu - Developer & UI Designer 

Mert Zehir -  Developer
